name: Hangman 2 (Windows Form Build)
description:
Quick game built with Windows Forms and C#. Will automatically start with a word loaded. You can press "New Game" to change the word. You can also add new words to the engine as you play, play with your friends and add you own words to have some fun! 

Note: One thing to note though is after you exit the game, those words will not be saved and will need to be added again.
